solution_line_template: The annual budget for policing is {total_budget} / {policing_divisor} = $<<{total_budget}/{policing_divisor}={policing_budget}>>{policing_budget} million.
The combined budget for education and policing is {policing_budget} + {education_budget} = $<<{policing_budget}+{education_budget}={combined_budget}>>{combined_budget} million.
There is {total_budget} - {combined_budget} = $<<{total_budget}-{combined_budget}={remaining_budget}>>{remaining_budget} million to manage public spaces.
